scripts.build: pnpm run guard:conflicts && node scripts/prevent-pages-router.js && next build
scripts.build:netlify: pnpm run content:build && node scripts/prevent-pages-router.js && next build
scripts.guard:conflicts:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');function walk(d){return fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true}).flatMap(e=>e.isDirectory()?walk(p.join(d,e.name)):[p.join(d,e.name)]);}const bad=walk('.').filter(f=>{try{const st=fs.statSync(f);if(!st.isFile())return false;const t=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');return /<<<<<<<|>>>>>>>/.test(t);}catch{return false;}});if(bad.length){console.error('
Merge markers found in:
'+bad.join('
'));process.exit(1);}"
scripts.check: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck
